home.about_text: My name is Enzo Pace, a student in BTS Information Systems for Organizations (SLAM). Passionate about software development and new technologies, I'm developing skills in programming, IT project management, and teamwork.

modal.password_prompt: Please enter the password to access documents related to this project.

remax.title: RE/MAX France
remax.description: RE/MAX is a company specialized in real estate. My missions include:
missions: Finding and fixing bugs in the CRM.

eurodislog.title: Eurodislog
eurodislog.description: Eurodislog is a company specialized in logistics. My missions as a Junior IT Project Manager include:
missions: IT project management to improve processes.
Optimization of internal logistics management tools.

summary.intro_text: In this section, I will present a comprehensive overview of my journey, explaining the skills I've developed, the projects I've worked on, and how this training has contributed to my personal and professional development.
summary.projects_text: In this part, I analyze the main projects I completed during my training:
summary.experience_text: Here I discuss my overall training experience: the aspects I enjoyed the most, the challenges I overcame, and how it prepared me for my future career.
summary.future_text: I present my professional goals for the future, how I plan to continue developing my skills, and in which field I wish to thrive after completing this training.
